description:
The world is monochrome, but there’s no such thing as a brush without color. Join Inky as they jump and paint their way to the next page in this 2.5D platformer adventure! Using the power of color, guide Inky past dangers as they collect pieces in order to restore their world using the power of the Super-Brush. Just how bright can you make their world? 

Chromatic is a game made by Game Design undergrad students. This build showcases a polished level that uses every feature! 

Team: 

Lead Designer: Eric Osorio 

Programmers: Brandon Perez, Eric Osorio 

Level Designers: Austin Menard, Kyle Remy 

Artists: Meaghan Archer, Kyle Remy, Brynn Jones 

Sound: Meaghan Archer, Kyle Remy
